p.s: The articalarticle Is the usefulness of unions in the protection of workers rights coming to an end? The answer is yes, was written by Brian Pollard and published in The Gulf News on 24.11.2011.
It's about the fact that workers need protection and how they get it.
Unions helped many workers from not being mistreated.
The opinion has changed and the unions aren't longer the protections of workers.
The reasons are the legistationlegislation, laws and the moral values of the people.
It's an unhealthy relationship to their employers.
The protection of workers coming to an end.
